DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this pilot study is to evaluate the validity and reproducibility of a functional test "Test C13" ureogenesis to measure in vivo, using the methodology Laboratory of Metabolic Diseases of "Cliniques Universitaires Saint-Luc"
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Project of the Functional C13 Test "Pilot Study"
DOC.criteria: healthy or with a disorder of the urea cycle
